document_data.name: Elemental Burst
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elemental burst''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[wu jen]] that unleashed a burst of elemental energy from a target. The spell was very rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].

Effects.Air: Created a burst of air that formed a concussive wave.
Effects.Fire: Created a fire that would throw off sparks that ignited inflammable material in the spell's area of effect.
Effects.Stone and Wood: Created a burst of sharp slivers of stone or wood.
Effects.Water:
Created a strong wave that swept through the area of effect. Boats and ships were unaffected. 

If a wu jen attempted to cast this spell in the [[phlogiston]], the spell would fail.

document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
